distroDB

Class MerkleTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • distroDB.MerkleTree

  • public class MerkleTree
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    canshi wei Merkle tree used to quick verification, error detection and recovery Which continuosly compute the hash between to nodes, ultimatly come into a hash root. For verification, simple compare if the hash root are the same.
